titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain cups, with or without saucers, of porcelain or china.
To suspend temporarily the duty on certain cups, with or without saucers, of porcelain or china.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on certain cups, with or without saucers, of porcelain or china.
